BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 945xxxx && 94xxxx-1xxx or 91xxxx,94xxx...

BLOCK_USERS.description: Choose which users that bot won't work in groups. Ex: 945xxxx && 94xxxx-1xxx or 91xxxx,94xxx...

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

PM_BLOCK.description: Write true if you want to block inbox commands ( not for you)

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.

AUTO_BIO.description: Set true for auto date to your bio, time in biography.
